welcome.text:
This is an ONA Survey for your organization.
Please follow the next screens to complete the survey.

messages.success_text: Your response has been successfully submitted.
messages.non_consent_text: You have disagreed to provide the required information.Please contact your organization to know more about this survey and its importance.You can again visit this link to take the survey.

privacy_policy.text:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: February 21, 2023

This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.

We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy.agree_checkbox_text: I have read and agree to orglens.com's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.disagree_confirmation_text: This survey may be very important for your organization. Are you sure you want to disagree and not participate in the survey?

data_collection_form.text:
Data Collection

The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use Your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.

screen1.text:
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY BEFORE PROCEEDING

The questions are about whom all do you connect / reach out to either for personal or professional related matters.

By answering these questions carefully, you will also get a detailed report of your social network within this organization. This report can be extremely useful for you.

Your answers will be used to create a network diagram of the team / organization. This network diagram and the insights from that will be used by the organization to increase overall engagement, collaboration, inclusion etc.

screen2.text:
How to Take the survey / fill the question

There are only 6 questions

  • Each question will be asking you about the people whom you reach out for personal / professional related matters
  • Choose all the people whom you reach out to for each specific question (if you reach out to 6 people for work related matters usually, choose all those 6 persons)
  • You should also mention how frequently (daily/ weekly/q/y) you reach out to them
  • You can type the name of the persons / contact in the box provided below the name text box. The names are already there, so you will not have to type the complete name.
  • If someone whom you reach out is not appearing in the list, you can select others
  • Any time during the survey, you can go backward or forward and edit/change the response

Now go to the next slide and have fun taking the surveyâ€¦!
